data.title: The Arizona Republic
data.meta_description: Get live updates from our insider Sarah McLellan as the Coyotes take on the Devils in New Jersey.
data.text:
Phoenix Coyotes vs. New Jersey Devils - live updates, analysis

Get live updates from our insider Sarah McLellan as the Coyotes take on the Devils in New Jersey.

Thursday's game

Coyotes at Devils

When: 4 p.m.

Where: Prudential Center.

TV/radio: FSAZ/KMVP-AM (860).

Devils update: The Devils have won three in a row but are facing an uphill climb to secure a wild-card spot in the Eastern Conference. They're five points shy of a berth and chasing four teams that are in serious contention for one of the seeds. The Devils are 10-3-2 in their past 15 home games. They've also scored three or more goals in eight of their past 13 games. Winger Jaromir Jagr leads the team with 60 points. He's tied for the team lead in goals (23) with center Adam Henrique.
